author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bank of Ireland net loan book grows in Q1
text:
April 20 (Reuters) - Bank of Ireland Group PLC:
* NET INTEREST MARGIN FOR 3 MONTHS TO MARCH 2018 WAS 2.22% * GROUP CONTINUES TO EXPECT THAT OPERATING EXPENSES FOR 2018 WILL BE LOWER THAN 2017
* CUSTOMER LOAN VOLUMES WERE EUR 76 BILLION AT END OF MARCH 2018, WITH NEW LENDING VOLUMES EXCEEDING REDEMPTIONS BY EUR 0.1 BILLION
* GROSS NEW LENDING IN Q1 2018 WAS 20% HIGHER THAN SAME PERIOD IN 2017
* MORTGAGE MARKET SHARE WAS 28% FOR FIRST 2 MONTHS OF 2018 * FULLY LOADED CET1 RATIO INCREASED BY A NET 10BPS TO 13.7% Further company coverage: (Reporting By Padraic Halpin)
